column4: if i wanted to set up a network between 2 computers using a cat 5 crossover cable and since im using my phone as a usb modem i want to share internet between both computers is this a possible thing?
if i wanted to set up a network between 2 computers using a cat 5 crossover cable and since im using my phone as a usb modem i want to share internet between both computers is this a possible thing?
if i wanted to set up a network between 2 computers using a cat 5 crossover cable and since im using my phone as a usb modem i want to share internet between both computers is this a possible thing?
Should be. With most newer systems they will even autodetect the type of cable so it would probably work even if you use one that isn't crossover...
